routeRandomSigmaDescription: the randomization sigma of edge weigths
explorationPercentageDescription: the percentage of routes we want to use for exploration
maxSpeedAndLengthFactorDescription: how much the length/speed influences the routing
averageEdgeDurationFactorDescription: how much the averageEdgeFactor influences the routing
freshnessUpdateFactorDescription: how much the freshnessUpdateFactor influences the routing
freshnessCutOffValueDescription: if data is older than this we do not consider it in the algorithm
reRouteEveryTicksDescription: check for a new route very x times after the car starts
